sentences.sContent: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
sentences.sContent_eng: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们所做的都是我们擅长的事情，我们最终将使自己大吃一惊。

remMethod.val: as + tound(看作sound， 声音) → 像被奇怪的声音吓倒 → 震惊

words.tran: 令人震惊的；令人惊骇的
